div.pre: 207 Butrinto (anc. Buthrotum), 14 km. S (174) of SarandÃ«, Albania, 1927 Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 15 AR Caulonia: 1 dr. Dyrrhachium: 5 didr. Corcyra: 1 didr.; 2 dr. Corinth: 4 dr.; 1 hemidr. Sicyon: 1 dr. Disposition: Rome Cesano, AttiMemIIN 7 (1932), pp. 47-58, illus.
